txt.en: If there is the slightest trace of a once-living spirit within the grim, it would seem that it is not enough to show any sign of compassion or mercy. At the slightest sign of warmth or life they strike, seemingly intent on snuffing it out in a howling assault of hail and hatred.

You have begun to think that the Gauredain are indeed mistaken in their beliefs.\n\nThe windy howls of the grim hint only at malice and glee as they strive to strip the flesh of living things with stinging needles of ice.
